name: SWIFTMILE, INC.
description: Manufacture and sale of docking stations for eScooters and eBikes
sampleDescriptions: Company seeks to educate and engage Congress, Department of Transportation and DC Government on its products, which provide solar powered docking stations for eScooters and eBikes.
